summary: An external email from an unidentified sender to an unidentified recipient, dated April 11, 2022, in which the sender states they have left several messages and have more information regarding Jeffrey Epstein, and requests a callback.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email is regarding Jeffrey Epstein, with the sender claiming to have more information about him.

keyFacts: An email dated April 11, 2022, indicates an ongoing effort by an individual to provide information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender claims to have left several prior messages and to possess 'more information'.
The identities of both the sender and recipient are redacted or not provided in the excerpt.
The document is an external email, suggesting communication from outside an organization to an internal party.
The subject line indicates it is a 'Follow up', showing persistence by the sender.
